StatView - Class in com.example.habittracker2017
Passed start date of habit and calculates all scheduled days in between start date and end date compares to habit events, if habit event exists for that date put it in completed array if no habit event found for it put it in missed pie chart vals are completed/(completed + missed) and missed/(completed+missed)
